Anko rushes her target with a series of slashes with a twin-knee-leap in-between followed by another slash into a kunai reap, then finishes by [[Hidden Shadow Snake Hands|releasing snakes]] from both wrists.

In both ''Clash of Ninja Revolution 3'' and ''Gekitō Ninja Taisen! Special'', Anko uses the finisher straightaway instead on its own, along with the snakes/hitboxes being shot-out as a larger funnel array.

== Trivia ==
* Akin to the [[Nine-Tailed Naruto Wild Attack]], this attack's entire sequence despite requiring an initial blow will scale normally with damage scaling due to not being a cinematic attack.
